description.ko: 유기적 생명체와 합성 기술의 교차점을 시각적으로 탐구하며, 식물들이 전기 에너지와 데이터 스트림으로 맥동하는 활기찬 생태계를 보여줍니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of the intersection between organic life and synthetic technology, showcasing a vibrant ecosystem where flora pulses with electric energy and data streams.

prompt: A high-resolution macro shot of a bioluminescent flower with translucent petals revealing intricate glowing circuit patterns, surrounded by floating digital particles and neon fiber-optic vines in a dark void, cinematic lighting, futuristic aesthetic, 8k, hyper-detailed.
